title: The Week of Wisdom: Peggy Lewis Saves Her City

story.text: Peggy Lewis, a retired teacher and part-time counselor, discovers she can hear people's thoughts after a strange meteorite lands in her garden. Concerned, she seeks to understand this new ability.
By Tuesday, Peggy realizes she can use her power to help her students and tutees. During a tutoring session, she tunes into her student's frustrations, guiding them more effectively.
The news spreads of a crime spree in her neighborhood. Peggy decides to use her powers to listen for malicious intentions, hoping to prevent further incidents.
Peggy confronts a group of would-be robbers, calming them with her serene disposition and wise words before they can act. The robbers, amazed by her understanding, turn themselves in.
With her community now aware of her powers, Peggy opens a workshop on conflict resolution, using her abilities to facilitate understanding during sessions.
The city council invites Peggy to mediate an important meeting with the potential to affect thousands of citizens. Her insights lead to an unprecedented unanimous agreement.
Reflecting on her week, Peggy writes a book combining her counseling wisdom with new thoughts on communal harmony and psychic empathy, aiming to inspire others.

ending: Thus, Peggy Lewis proves that superpowers can age like fine wine, becoming instruments of peace and progression.
moral: Wisdom and compassion, combined with extraordinary abilities, can transform communities in profound ways.
